Measure: Prevalence of {cause} for cause in [measles, diarrhea, LRI, neural tube defects, vitamin A deficiency]
Prevalence of {sequela} for sequela in [severe anemia, moderate anemia, mild anemia, no anemia]
Birth prevalence of {cause} for cause in [neural tube defects, lower respiratory infections]
Priority: High for NTDs, Med for LRI

Measure: Hemoglobin mean at {age} for age in [6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years]
Numerator: sum of hemoglobin values at {age} for {strata}

Measure: Hemoglobin variance at {age} for age in [6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years]
Numerator: sum of squared differences between hemoglobin value and hemoglobin mean at {age}
Notes: See notes below for two possible methods of computing variance

Numerator: sum of birthweights of simulants in {strata}
sum of squared differences between individual birthweight and mean birthweight in {strata}
Notes: See notes below for two possible methods of computing variance

Numerator: Sum over all causes of deaths due to {cause} for {strata}
Sum over all causes of deaths due to {cause} for {strata}
Total YLLs for {strata} + Total YLDs for {strata}
YLLs due to {cause} for {strata} + YLDs due to {cause} for {strata}

Measure: Proportion of population with IFA coverage
Numerator: Person-time with simulant's household covered by iron fortification or folic acid fortification, for simulants in {strata}
Notes: The same households receive iron as receive folic acid since they share the same vehicle (wheat flour)

Measure: Proportion of population with vitamin A coverage
Numerator: Person-time with simulant's household covered by vitamin A fortification, for simulants in {strata}
